name: The InBetween (VCDGamer)
description:
"You've met with a terrible fate, haven't you?"

The InBetween is an episodic 2d action-adventure platformer where players take on the role of a young boy named Pipit, who finds himself on a quest to save the world of Aija from deadly Vir or… END IT.

Controls(Keyboard):

Z -- Accept, Next, Jump

X -- Shoot

C -- Dash

S - Parry (Watch out for signs)

Left Control - Special Ability

Q (Hold) - Special Ability Menu

Feeling Impatient?

Numpad 9 - Self-Destruct(Suicide)

Numpad 7 - Teleport to room before boss fight with all abilities unlocked.

Return/Enter - Pause
